column1: # mapping_set_description: Manually curated alignment of KEWL FOODIE INC internal food
#   and nutrition database with Food Ontology (FOODON). Intended to be used for ontological
#   analysis and grouping of KEWL FOODIE INC related data.
# comment: We could map to FOODON:00004187 instead which more specifically refers to
#   'raw' Pink apples. Decided against to be consistent with other mapping choices.

column11: We could map to FOODON:03310788 instead to cover sliced apples, but only "whole" apple types exist.
We could map to FOODON:00004187 instead which more specifically refers to "raw" Pink apples. Decided against to be consistent with other mapping choices.
